Description

At Hilltop Camper and RV our goal is to be The Premier Destination for Outdoor Fun!!

Are you obsessed with providing the best customer service? Do you strive to maximize your sales potential? Does the phrase "Showroom Ready" resonate from within? If so, you could have what it takes to be our next Sales Consultant.

We are looking for an experienced sales professional with CRM experience. General RV knowledge or experience is helpful as well. We offer an amazing pay plan and full benefits available.

Hilltop Trailer Sales is a 3rd generation, family-owned business founded in 1951. We have grown to 6 locations in MN and nearly 150 employees. Our Core Values are on display everywhere in our stores, but it's not just writing on the walls, it's how we do business! If this sounds interesting apply now to find out more!

Salary: From $65,000.00 per year

Benefits:
• 401(k)
• 401(k) matching
• Dental insurance
• Health insurance
• Health savings account
• Paid time off
• Vision insurance

Compensation package:
• Commission pay
• Uncapped commission

Schedule: 8 hour shift

Work Location: In person
